title: Mizoram PSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Junior Engineer Posts
description: The Mizoram Public Service Commission (Mizoram PSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, Diploma in Electrical Engineering can apply for the Mizoram PSC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age ...
